text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadir): “E ŵandu ŵangu! Kamulani masengo yatin'jile paakamula (ni ukombosi wenu wosope), une none ngukamula (mwangukamulila), basi tinchiyika kumanyilila kuti nduni jwachijiŵa mbesi jakwe (jambone) pachilambo (chaduniya chino ni ku Akhera kwakwe). Chisimu chene ŵalupuso ngaŵa nkupunda.”
